title.rendered: “Remembering the Fallen: IDF Releases Names of Casualties and Details of Gaza Strip Battle”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF Spokesperson regarding the names of three IDF casualties, which has been delivered to their families: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC020320247249075905

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where their details and pictures of the fallen are published and updated: https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, a department commander and four soldiers from the 450th Battalion were severely injured in a battle in the southern Gaza Strip. Nine more soldiers were injured in various ways during this battle.

The wounded were taken for medical treatment in a hospital, their families have been updated.
